oai_dc:dc.dc:title: UBS Tower Under Construction, c.1970s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the UBS Tower under construction, circa 1970s. Located at 315 Deaderick Street, the UBS Tower is a 108-meter, 28-story skyscraper. It was originally called the First American Center when the building was completed in 1974. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
